property_description:
Located in the exclusive residential community of La Mina, Puerto Ángel.

Wake up every day to the sound of the waves and sweeping views of the Pacific from this stunning two-bedroom, two-bathroom oceanfront home in the gated community of La Mina. With 2,368 Ft2 of beautifully designed living space, this brand-new residence blends modern architecture with tropical charm, creating the ultimate retreat by the sea.

The home is thoughtfully laid out over two levels, with spacious open-concept interiors that flow seamlessly onto expansive terraces. Both bedrooms and the main living area open to large outdoor spaces, designed to maximize the breathtaking ocean views. A palapa-covered terrace provides a shaded lounge area, while the private pool and outdoor shower invite you to embrace the coastal lifestyle year-round.

The principal bedroom is a sanctuary with dramatic views of the ocean, complemented by a luxurious en suite bathroom where even the shower overlooks the sea. Throughout the home, high-quality finishes such as aluminum doors and windows with a warm wood finish add style and durability.

This oceanfront home is being sold fully furnished and move-in ready, complete with a gas stove, oven, microwave, and refrigerator. A dedicated laundry area is included, and while there is no private parking on-site, the property is set within a secure, gated community for peace of mind.

Designed for those who value comfort, style, and connection to nature, this residence offers the perfect blend of indoor and outdoor living. Whether you are looking for a full-time coastal residence, a vacation home, or a turnkey rental opportunity, this property in La Mina delivers an exceptional lifestyle by the ocean.

*The property is listed at $19,780,000 MXN, with pricing shown in USD for marketing purposes.

Make your dream home on Oaxaca’s stunning coast a reality. Contact us today for details or to arrange a private viewing.

property_description:
ALMA – Where Architecture Meets Soul

Tucked between the Pacific Ocean and the Sierra Madre mountains in Huatulco, Oaxaca, ALMA is a thoughtfully designed residential retreat that blends warm minimalism, sustainability, and understated luxury. This boutique, low-density community offers 2 to 4 bedroom condos and villas, each created as a space for restoration, privacy, and connection to nature.

Designed by JJRR/Arquitectura and Módica-Ledezma, ALMA embraces modern Mexican architecture while honoring its spectacular surroundings. Every home is positioned to capture sweeping ocean views, featuring open layouts, travertine marble floors, Macuil wood cabinetry, and indoor-outdoor living spaces that let the beauty of Huatulco flow inside. Expansive terraces, private infinity pools, and discreet climate control enhance comfort without disturbing the natural environment.

At ALMA, luxury is quiet, intentional, and rooted in sustainability. Residents enjoy a wellness center with sauna, cold plunge, and massage areas; two saltwater swimming pools; a fully equipped gym; and personalized concierge service. From vegetated roofs and solar strategies to on-site water treatment and a reforestation program within Huatulco’s National Park, every detail reflects a deep respect for the land.

Located in one of Mexico’s most environmentally protected regions—Huatulco, a Platinum EarthCheck-certified destination known for its pristine bays, clean beaches, and thoughtful growth—ALMA offers space, silence, and soulful living for those who want to truly belong in nature.

ALMA is starting at $16,200,000 MXN, but has been converted to USD for search purposes only.

property_description:
Casa Lupita: A fully accessible coastal paradise in Huatulco, Mexico.

This stunning and truly one-of-a-kind villa in La Bocana, Huatulco offers an inclusive and luxurious lifestyle just 300 meters from the beach. Casa Lupita features 7 bedrooms and 8.5 bathrooms across 738 M2 (7,943 Ft2) of construction on a generous 774 M2 (8,325 Ft2) lot. What makes this home stand out is its intentional and thoughtful design prioritizing full accessibility, making it a rare gem in the coastal real estate market.

From the moment you arrive, you'll notice that every element has been carefully considered for ease of movement and comfort. All doors are sliding to accommodate wheelchairs, bathrooms are spacious and mobility-friendly, and a chairlift provides seamless access to the second floor. Pathways are gently sloped with handrails in place, creating a home that is both beautiful and barrier-free. This villa is ideal for anyone seeking a truly inclusive space—whether for personal use, family members with mobility needs, or as an accessible vacation rental investment.

Outdoor living is at the heart of this home. A 70 M2 swimming pool, complete with a natural stone cave, waterfall, and built-in bench seating, becomes the centerpiece of relaxation and entertainment. The patio area is expansive, with half of it shaded and the other half open to the sun, providing versatility for all-day enjoyment. The outdoor bar and grill area is perfect for entertaining guests or hosting family gatherings, while two jacuzzis offer spaces to unwind and enjoy the tranquil surroundings. Mature landscaping and jungle views, with no neighbors behind thanks to ownership of the adjacent lot, ensure exceptional privacy and a peaceful atmosphere.

Sustainability is another cornerstone of the property. It includes 18 solar panels that significantly reduce energy costs, three cisterns, and a 10,000-liter tinaco, ensuring reliable access to water year-round. The villa’s natural materials—such as guanacastle wood, river rock, bamboo, and polished concrete—blend effortlessly into the surrounding environment while enhancing the warmth and elegance of the design.

The villa also offers two separate suites with private kitchens, making it ideal for hosting extended family, guests, or generating rental income. Ample indoor and outdoor storage, spacious cabinetry in the kitchen, and dual access from both the driveway and street level further enhance functionality. There is also potential to build two additional casitas on-site, adding even more value and flexibility to the property.

Included with the sale are high-end appliances such as an oven, stove, fridge, microwave, and dishwasher. Secure parking and an on-site laundry area complete the offering, ensuring this home is as practical as it is luxurious.

Located in the charming and quiet beach community of La Bocana, this villa is a rare opportunity to own a fully accessible, beautifully designed, and move-in-ready coastal property with high rental potential and long-term value. This is more than a home—it’s a private retreat where inclusivity, sustainability, and style come together in perfect harmony.

property_description:
Located beachfront on Zipolite beach.

This beautifully maintained 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom penthouse offers 884 Ft2 of thoughtfully designed living space in the exclusive Monarca development. With direct beach access to Zipolite Beach, this residence combines privacy, comfort, and the ultimate beachfront lifestyle. Perched on the top floor of the exclusive Monarca development, this penthouse offers easy and convenient access to an expansive, palapa-covered rooftop—a shared oasis perfect for dinner gatherings, workouts (complete with a bench, free weights and mat), yoga sessions, remote work or simply unwinding in a hammock or on comfortable furniture with a book in hand. Sold fully furnished and recently upgraded, this turnkey property is ready for you to move in and start living your coastal dream.

Just 50 meters away, the town of Zipolite offers an effortlessly walkable lifestyle. From fresh fruit and vegetable stands to bakeries, gelato shops, pharmacies, ATMs, and even a car wash, everything you need is within reach. Zipolite is a one-of-a-kind coastal community, known for its free-spirited energy, yoga centers, beachfront restaurants, and laid-back vibe. Whether you’re soaking in the natural beauty or stepping out to explore the area’s vibrant dining and wellness scene, this location has it all.

Set within a secure, gated beachfront community, this condo offers a peaceful and private retreat with a thoughtfully designed layout. Ideal as a tranquil escape or a low-maintenance coastal home, the property also features a large common swimming pool and direct beach access. Reliable Starlink connectivity is available on the rooftop, in the parking area, and in the manager’s office—ensuring you stay connected no matter where you are on the property.

Don't miss the opportunity to own a slice of paradise in one of Mexico’s most iconic beach towns—where comfort, convenience, and coastal charm come together effortlessly.

Located in the prestigious Montecito Beach Village, La Bocana, Huatulco.

Welcome to Villa Soleri, your private coastal oasis where modern luxury blends seamlessly with authentic Oaxacan artistry. Perched above the Pacific, this elegant villa boasts panoramic ocean and beach views of Bocana, setting the stage for an exceptional lifestyle.

Designed for both relaxation and entertaining, the villa features three spacious bedrooms, a den, and 4.5 beautifully appointed bathrooms, offering comfort and privacy for you and your guests. Whether you're hosting family and friends or simply enjoying the peaceful surroundings, this home adapts effortlessly to your needs.

Step outside to your expansive outdoor living area, where a private infinity pool merges with the horizon. The outdoor kitchen and surfboard-inspired eating bar invite you to dine al fresco or sip cocktails while surrounded by lush greenery and sparkling ocean views.

Inside, coastal sophistication meets warm, inviting charm. Every detail has been thoughtfully curated—from the authentic Oaxacan art on the walls to the professionally furnished interiors. The open-concept layout includes a media room, a functional workspace, and a gourmet kitchen outfitted with premium Electrolux appliances—delivering both elegance and practicality.

Just steps away, Playa Los Arcos—an exclusive beach for Montecito residents—offers unmatched access to coastal serenity. A second lower-level terrace and lush gardens provide additional space to relax or entertain in total privacy.

As part of the Montecito Beach Village community, you’ll enjoy access to a host of premium amenities: 24/7 gated security, concierge and maid services, a beach club with a saltwater pool and restaurant (accessible via funicular), and the scenic Loma Lounge, ideal for evening gatherings. Organic walking paths and golf cart shuttles connect you to every corner of the community with ease.

Additional highlights include:

  • $100K USD in integrated state-of-the-art audio, video, and internet systems
  • Private parking and a storage locker with easy trail and beach access
  • Pet-friendly policies
  • Sold fully furnished, exactly as shown

With no immediate neighbors—thanks to the adjacent lot also owned by the seller—Villa Soleri offers unrivaled privacy in a prime location. The neighboring lot is also available for purchase, offering expansion potential or added seclusion.

Don’t miss this unique opportunity to own a stunning retreat in one of Huatulco’s most coveted beachfront communities. Contact us today to experience Villa Soleri and discover the very best of coastal living.

property_description:
Nestled in the heart of La Punta Zicatela, this exclusive development offers an exceptional investment opportunity with an outstanding return on investment (ROI) in one of Mexico’s most sought-after coastal destinations. Designed by award-winning architect Miguel Carroll, founder of Estudio Carroll, this project blends sustainability, innovation, and minimalist elegance, making it an ideal choice for discerning buyers and investors alike.

Each unit features a modern and minimalist design with clean lines and expansive windows that flood the interiors with natural light. The private terrace and pool in every residence provide the perfect setting to unwind and enjoy the serene surroundings. High-quality finishes enhance the sophisticated aesthetic, including Chukum-type microcement walls, polished pigmented concrete floors, Macuil wood doors and closets, and beautifully crafted colored melamine kitchens. Oaxaca red clay bricks and pasta tiles add a touch of artisanal charm, while wood-look aluminum exterior frames ensure durability and style.

Designed to harmonize with its lush surroundings of tropical trees and vibrant vegetation, Sixa Nido offers 24 unique studios spread across eight buildings. Prioritizing nature, the development features wooden bridges that connect each space, with every meeting point serving as a work of art.

These units go beyond the typical studio experience, incorporating distinctive design elements such as a striking unique headboard, exquisite Oaxacan craftsmanship in the flooring, textured walls, and carefully designed windows that capture sunlight throughout the day.

Sixa Nido is designed by 98mm Taller, an Oaxacan architectural firm founded in 1998, specializing in creating residential and commercial spaces that seamlessly blend tradition with contemporary aesthetics. By integrating natural materials like adobe, wood, and clay with modern elements such as steel and exposed concrete, 98mm Taller crafts spaces that respect cultural and environmental contexts while maintaining functionality and elegance. Each project reflects a deep passion for Oaxacan identity.

Each membership includes 21 days of Planned Vacation time per Club Year, which can be enjoyed in one, two, or three separate stays, offering flexibility to suit your schedule. Welcome to Casa Piedra, a luxurious beachfront property where stunning ocean views meet spacious, modern living. Unmatched Location & Investment Opportunity: Casa Piedra's beachfront setting offers direct access to the beach and is just moments from a nearby lagoon. The multi-family layout provides exceptional rental revenue potential, making it an ideal investment for those looking to generate income or host large gatherings of friends and family.

With its blend of luxury and convenience, Casa Piedra invites you to experience the best of coastal living.

Secure this tropical retreat for $1,600,000 USD and start living your beachfront dream today.

property_description:
Situated in the prestigious enclave of La Cañada in Residencial Conejos, Hacienda Huatulco, this ocean view villa offers an exceptional living experience. The residence, spanning 10,753 ft2, is thoughtfully designed across three expansive lots, together forming a 25,530 ft2 estate. The villa features three generously sized bedrooms, each with breathtaking views of the ocean or surrounding mountains, complemented by three full bathrooms and four half bathrooms.

La Hacienda's High-End Interior Features

Luxury is evident throughout the home, with large bedrooms, ample closet space, substantial storage and a elevator for easy access to the levels. The spacious bathrooms are designed for comfort and convenience, and the open concept living room on the main floor provides an inviting space for relaxation and entertainment. There is potential for additional accommodations, either by building one or two casitas on the property or converting the existing office into a fourth bedroom.

The residence is equipped with high-end appliances, including an oven, gas stove, large fridge, microwave, and dishwasher. The grand parota-wood staircase and hand-made Saltillo floor tiles highlight the craftsmanship and attention to detail that define this home. The main entry door, crafted from maquil wood in a hobbit-style design, adds a whimsical touch to the overall aesthetic.

Hacienda Colorado Outdoor Amenities and Entertaining

Enjoy enhanced outdoor living with a stunning saltwater infinity pool and a fully outfitted outdoor kitchen ideal for entertaining. The kitchen features high-end appliances such as a "Prestige Pro" Napoleon BBQ, a Hoshizaki icemaker and a Liebherr bar fridge. The property is equipped with extensive solar panels that power the home, along with a solar water heater and propane backup. Additionally, you'll find a private, well-appointed gym that includes a treadmill, elliptical, stationary bike, dumbbells, benches, and a steam room.

Security and Additional Facilities

The Hacienda villa's exterior is equally impressive, featuring composite wood pergolas, an automatic irrigation system for the meticulously maintained gardens, and an Astroturf area for pets. The use of Mexican-sourced wood throughout the house, with custom-made cabinetry and furniture crafted by local carpenters, adds a unique touch. The structural integrity of the home is ensured with the use of 1" rebar, and security is enhanced with cameras and motion detectors at the main entrance.

Additional features include a large bodega with potential for conversion into staff quarters, a 500-gallon cistern, and a spacious laundry room offering extra storage. The property provides parking for three cars and comes fully furnished, ready for immediate occupancy. Hacienda villa combines exclusivity, luxury, and functionality, making it a truly unique home in the heart of Huatulco.

property_description:
Discover the epitome of luxury living in this exquisite property located in the serene coastal town of Chelem, Yucatan. This stunning home offers an unparalleled blend of elegance, comfort, and modern convenience, making it the perfect retreat for those seeking a high-end lifestyle.

As an added bonus, the sellers are including their 2022 Kia Sportage with the purchase—making this an even more exceptional opportunity for a turnkey coastal life.

The main house features two spacious and elegantly designed bedrooms, each providing ultimate comfort and style. There are also 2.5 luxurious bathrooms, complete with high-end fixtures and finishes. Additionally, the property includes a charming casita with one bedroom and one bathroom, perfect for accommodating guests or additional family members.

This luxury home is adorned with high-end finishes throughout, showcasing meticulous craftsmanship in every detail. The living room boasts a striking full marble slab wall, adding a touch of sophistication to the space. The rooftop terrace offers an ideal spot for enjoying panoramic views and entertaining guests, while the air-conditioned garage, equipped with a motorized roll-up door, ensures convenience and security.

Sustainability is a key feature of this property, with 44 solar panels providing energy efficiency. The osmosis water system ensures purified water throughout the home, adding an extra layer of luxury. Ample storage is available with two spacious bodegas and a dedicated mechanical room, while the laundry room is equipped with top-notch appliances for added convenience.

The gourmet kitchen is a chef’s dream, featuring aluminum and glass cabinets by Luova, complete with pull-out interior drawer systems. Hafele accessories, including drawer dividers, spice racks, and knife blocks, provide optimal organization. The kitchen is outfitted with premium Miele appliances, including a speed oven, a 94 cm induction cooktop, a whisper-quiet dishwasher, a built-in coffee maker, and a built-in wine refrigerator. The Liebherr refrigerator and freezer with glass panels, a 90cm Elica fan hood, Kohler cast iron double sink, commercial chrome faucet, In-Sinkerator disposal, and Silestone quartz countertops and backsplash complete this top-of-the-line kitchen.

The master suite is a luxurious haven, featuring his and her vanities with Silestone countertops. The spacious round shower is equipped with Hansgrohe dual hand showers and a ceiling-mounted rain head, accented by opalescent Onix mosaic tile. Built-in drawer storage and a closet with ample hanging space provide practical yet elegant storage solutions.

Outdoor amenities include a Pentair saltwater pool, perfect for a refreshing dip. The BBQ area is ideal for entertaining, featuring a Coyote stainless steel BBQ with a griddle, manufactured in Texas, aluminum and glass cabinets, and durable porcelain tile countertops.

Security is paramount in this property, with cameras installed throughout, all viewable via phone, and an Arlo wireless doorbell equipped with a camera, also operable via phone. Custom stainless-steel handrails adorn the main house and casita stairways, as well as the master and casita terraces, adding a sleek and modern touch.

This luxurious home offers an unparalleled lifestyle in a tranquil coastal setting—complete with a 2022 Kia Sportage to get you on the road to your next adventure in style. Experience the finest in design, comfort, and sustainability in this exquisite property in Chelem, Yucatan.

Schedule your private viewing today and step into your dream home!

Located in the laid back beach town of Puerto Angel.

Experience the ultimate Costa Chica lifestyle at this stunning oceanfront condo! Wake up to the gentle sound of waves and enjoy the luxury of watching the sunrise right from your bed, setting the tone for a day filled with tranquility and natural beauty.

Spanning 1,133 square feet, this meticulously designed 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo epitomizes tropical comfort both indoors and out. Step into an expansive interior that seamlessly blends with the outdoors through two terraces, offering panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean.

Perched atop a rocky peninsula, Viewpoint at Puerto Angel commands unparalleled 270-degree ocean vistas that will undoubtedly leave you breathless. Spend leisurely afternoons lounging by the pool, where sightings of whales and dolphins against the backdrop of the rugged coastline are not uncommon.

Located at the heart of the Oaxaca coast, this property immerses you in the authentic charm of Mexican beach villages, each offering its own unique blend of culture and cuisine. Whether you seek a permanent residence or a vacation retreat, this condo presents a rare opportunity to embrace coastal living at its finest.

Contact us today to schedule a private showing and discover firsthand the allure of living at Viewpoint at Puerto Angel.

Enjoy playing pool, darts and poker in the games room, treatments in the spa or some yoga in the gym and a steam bath to ultimately relax during your stay. After a long day of pampering yourself retire to your spacious residences with, sculpted arches,  large terraces, beautiful mountain views, lofty ceilings, granite counter tops, and custom solid tropical wood  kitchens complete with gas cook tops and plenty of space. 

Mansiones Cruz Del Mar was designed to be your home away form home and if you can't get to Huatulco as often as you like to they have excellent rental history. Stay & Play at the Mansiones and find out what life is like in this spectacular gated community. 

Starting at $386,000 USD!
